name: anthracnose

a disease of plants and trees that causes brown or yellow marks on the leaves: You can see that these trees have become infected with the fungal disease anthracnose, causing most of the leaves to die. Anthracnose is a very damaging plant disease that can be hard to control once it has become established.
More examplesFewer examplesResearchers are investigating whether the vegetables have an inherited resistance to anthracnose.The fungi that cause anthracnose live in dead leaves over the winter and then spread in spring.
